### valves commands

`open all valves`

`close all valves`

`close valve 1 2 3 4` 

`read all values`

`pump up`

`pump down`

`pump valve 1 2 3 4` ( all other valves should be closed ) 


`underpressure ( pump )  -0.2`

`overpressure ( pump ) 0.2`

`aspirate` ( value next to it )

`needle up / down`
